name: Super Bomb Rush!
description: Super Bomb Rush is a quick fire, highly challenging Defuse 'Em Up!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 (3.40 GHz) or better; Quad-core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 (2GB) or better (DirectX 11 card Required) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
